data.event: The wettest year was 2004 with 28.49 inches (723.6 mm) including 6.97 inches (177.0 mm) in August, whilst the driest year with a full record was 1924 with only 4.85 inches (123.2 mm) including a mere 1.98 inches (50.3 mm) between July and October.

event.title: nights) and dry, with snow only recorded

data.event: Winters are mild (though with very cold nights) and dry, with snow only recorded in fourteen years since 1892.
